description:
If you’re the type of rider that isn’t going to let a little thing like weather get in between you and a great ride, then these pogies will help keep your digits happy. Building on feedback from pogie users, 45NRTH has redesigned the Cobrafist Pogies, making them better than ever (no more lost foam doughnuts). Slipping over your grips and controls, and securing your to your bike with lock-on bar end plugs, these pogies are like oversized mittens that become part of your cockpit in winter months.

  • Updated design uses and integrated foam doughnut and a hook-and-loop closure to seal the end facing the stem
  • Rugged Cordura® shell protects your hands from aggressive trees, and the pogies when you lay your bike down
  • Insulated with 400g synthetic insulation that stays warm even when wet
  • Elastic drawcord at the wrist seals the cold out and the warm in
  • Zippered vents let you customize your warmth
  • Lock-on end caps let you secure your pogies to your bike, making them easy to get in and out of
  • Inner pockets keep small valuables close and snacks from freezing
  • 45NRTH recommends these pogies for temperatures between -9 and -18°C
  • Fits flat bars 640mm and wider
name: 45NRTH Cobrafist Expedition Pogies - Unisex
